lead_paragraph: A report said the Harvard Prof. Henry Louis Gates Jr. and the sergeant who arrested him missed opportunities to “ratchet down” an avoidable confrontation.
snippet: A report said the Harvard Prof. Henry Louis Gates Jr. and the sergeant who arrested him missed opportunities to “ratchet down” an avoidable confrontation.

headline.main: Officer and Professor Faulted for Confrontation at Home
headline.seo: Report Looks at Sergeant Crowley’s Confrontation with Professor Gates
headline.print_headline: Officer and Professor Faulted For Confrontation at Home
